description: '''Jasmine Adams''' (born 7 February 2003), known professionally as '''Jazmin Bean''', is an English singer, songwriter, and [[makeup artist]]. Born and raised in [[London]], they{{Efn|Bean is [[agender]] and uses [[Singular they|they/them pronouns]].}} first gained attention online for their "extreme" makeup looks. They self-released their first [[extended play]] ''Worldwide Torture'' in 2019, which was later reissued in 2020 through [[Interscope]] and [[Island Records]]. Their debut album ''[[Traumatic Livelihood]]'' was released on 23 February 2024.
